channel.title: How to I make my emote tabs, react to teleblock?
channel.description:
Hi, I was wondering how I only make my Emote tabs work if they are not teleblocked? these are what I mean:
[IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/emoiteanyimations.jpg[/img]
so how do I get them to only work if they are not tele-blocked, because it is really annoying because if they get teleblocked they just use those emote buttons.
[IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/emoiteanyimations.jpg[/img]
so how do I stop this?
Many Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2007, 01:51:39 PM[/size][hr]rep++ for person that gets it right

item.title: How to I make my emote tabs, react to teleblock?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

case 170:
if(teleblocked == true){ 
sendMessage("A mysterious force stops you from teleporting"); 
}
else
{
customCommand("Pkbox2");
}
break;

You need to change the teleblocked to whatever your teleblock variable is.

Read full topic
item.source: How to I make my emote tabs, react to teleblock?

How would I add that?

item.title: How to I make my emote tabs, react to teleblock?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Add a teleblock check in the case for them

if(teleblocked == true){ 
sendMessage("A mysterious force stops you from teleporting"); 
}
else
{
//Add the case contents here 
}

Thats just a rough idea.
